mapper.update:
update Information
SPONSER=#{sponser},
IDENTIFICATION=#{identification},
COPYRIGHT=#{copyright},
ICPCODE=#{icpCode},
TOPLOGO=#{topLogo},
BOTTOMIMG1=#{bottomImg1},
BOTTOMIMG2=#{bottomImg2},
ABOUT_US=#{aboutUs},
CALL_US=#{callUs},
LEGAL_STATEMENT=#{legalStatement},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id,sponser,identification,copyright,icpcode,toplogo,bottomimg1,bottomimg2 from Information where rownum < 2 order by id desc
select id,about_us as aboutUs from Information where rownum < 2 order by id desc
select id,call_us as callUs from Information where rownum < 2 order by id desc
select id,legal_statement as legalStatement from Information where rownum < 2 order by id desc
